mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.USER_ID, C.NAME, C.CATEGORY, (SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM CLOTHING_IMAGES WHERE CLOTHING_ITEM_ID = C.ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS IMAGE_URL FROM CLOTHING_ITEMS C WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.STATUS = 'IN_CLOSET' AND C.IS_FOR_SALE = 'N' ORDER BY C.CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CLOTHING_ITEMS SET STATUS = 'DONATED', LIFECYCLE_TYPE = 'REUSE', LIFECYCLE_DETAIL = 'DONATE', DISPOSAL_METHOD = #{disposalMethod}, DISPOSED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
